site_name: GARAGES AT CROSSWAY COURT, ENDWELL ROAD, LONDON, SE4
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted in compliance with Condition 14 (Window Reveals) of the Planning Permission (DC/17/105055), dated 3 April 2018 as amended by the application approved under s.96a of the TCPA 1990 (as amended)  (DC/21/120444) dated 12 March 2021 for The demolition of one (1) existing single storey garage block comprised of eleven (11) garages and a screen wall at Crossway Court, Endwell Road SE4 2NE and the construction of a part three/part four storey building to provide nine (9) self contained residential units (C3), together with landscaping, refuse, sixteen (16) secure cycle parks and nine (9) car parks.
